text:
:wave: Hello, team!
I need small help wrt using HubSpot API

I am trying to use the API in Rails application. I could connect to HubSpot by using the client_id and secret_key. But that involves a user interaction like '*Choose account*'. So I am planning to connect by using the API key.
1. Can we avoid the user interaction when I am trying to connect with Oauth method?
2. Where Can I find the API Key?

Hi all, I am updating contacts via the api endpoint: *`/crm/v3/objects/contacts/{contactId}`*

Do you know if there is a way to only update a contact property when it’s empty or null at the time of running the code. For example, only update the firstname property if it currently is empty. I’m using Python and would super appreciate it if you could help

Hello I had a question about users who authorize a HubSpot marketplace app, the person who authorizes this during the oauth process, how do I get their information? Does it come from the `owners crm api` object?
It would not work with webhook, You need to call AJAX function with javascript and send data with "GET" method, and make sure Data is JSON string.

hi there
you may find your API key (or generate a new one) here: <https://app.HubSpot.com/api-key/{{your_account_id}}/call-log>

hi Stan,
you cannot do it via single request. you need to GET data first, than compare values, and then PATCH contact if needed

hi Kei,
best approach here would be to use search endpoint
```/crm/v3/objects/calls/search```
and filter them as you wish
more details you may find here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/search>
hi art, thank you for your help!
